rename.from: [ENH] clean up the `_contrib` folder, aim to remove

body: so I was just going to delete it once we had extracted the sklearn classifiers then you can put anything anyone wants back in later. All of this is experimental or redundant code and what you suggest involves a significant amount of work for very little benefit. But if anyone wants to do as you describe thats great.

issue.title: [ENH] refactor/integrate `_contrib` - `datasets`

labels.name: maintenance
labels.description: Continuous integration, unit testing & package distribution

repository.name: sktime
repository.description: A unified framework for machine learning with time series

issue.body:
Carries out part of https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/2942 - `datasets`.

* some `_config.datasets` contents were duplicates, these were removed
* some contents were *newer* versions with the `return_mtype` argument which @TonyBagnall et al never moved to the main module. These had a lot of duplicative code as they never underwent the refactor by @achieveordie. This has been addressed by refactoring the existing versions to have the additional argument
* there was also tests in the file `test_single_problem_loaders` which did not exist in the main repository - in fact, the `single_problem_loaders` were not tested in the main repo. The tests were moved to the main repo. They were also refactored, a lot of manual loops were replaced by `pytest.mark.parametrize`. These tests now cover the new argument `return_mtype` in the main module.
* docstrings were also corrected in the data loaders in the main module.
